2008-10-15

15 October 2008

Recruiters

  1. John Toronto
    Title: C# / .NET Programmer - Hedge Fund
    Skills: Financial Programming Background, C#, .NET, Quick Thinking, SQL, SOA Architecture
    Date: 9-26-2008
    Description:
    Looking for a C# / .Net Developer with great analytic background for this hedge fund. Hedge fund is a multi-strategy financial group with fixed income, equity, and derivatives trading groups. Position can be either 6 month + straight contract or contract to hire.

    Any financial product knowledge and quantitative background (i.e. Black-Scholes, Duration, Convexity, etc.) would be of value as well as excellent educational background.

    For immediate consideration please email john.toronto@scopusit.com

    No third parties for this position.
    Noah Wollowick
    Scopus IT
    1 Columbus Place
    South 34H
    New York, NY 10019
    Phone: (212) 744-5308
